entry.title: Just a test project.
entry.content: This is the first post about a project. Just a test one. There is supposedly a problem with the date of this post. What it is I do not understand.

entry.title: Bachelor thesis
entry.content: My Bachelor thesis is named “Recognising fake news in digital space”. Hopefully I’ll finish it in time.
